title: Enjoy Life Cooling Pillow Protectors with Zipper, Quilted Cold Pillowcases for Hot Sleepers, Super Soft Pillow Covers, Polyethylene(PE)-Set of 2, Queen Size
features: New advanced double knit fabric used: double knit fabric construction is similar as a Sandwich with three layers, the middle layer to provide very soft support to make sure the top layer to be soft and nice skin-touching

New Technology Cooling Materials Chosen: the surface layer of double knit fabric using super cool Polyethylene Filament- which is a kind of advanced technology Infused with special material to change the thermal conductivity of yarn. In this way to spread heat quickly during skin-touching

Maximum to give you comforter and cooling: double knit fabric with outstanding air flow performance, provide extremely soft and cool feeling on the surface layer, in order to make you all night durable cooling and comforter feeling
Classic pillow shell design: one end opening with branded zipper which is very convenient for daily use
Exquisite Detail Design: Luxurious Pattern; Branded zipper, prevent sneaking out through nights with enhanced protection.
description: MACHINE WASHABLE, 100% PERFORMANCE SATISFACTION GAURANTEED - The breathable bamboo pillow cover is machine washable. If you do not like these tech pillow protectors for any reason, let us know for a 100% money-back guarantee!
